content: beppe elizabeth s turtle pattern a few weeks ago my friend pauline wickens shared a photo of a stuffed turtle that her beloved beppe elizabeth hanenburg had lovingly made for her she asked if i could recreate the pattern and i ve done my best to bring it back to life i hope the turtles made from this pattern bring as much joy and comfort as pauline s has over the years to honor her memory i m also sharing some photos of elizabeth hanenburg so her love and creativity live on through each stitch materials three crows fiber augusta yarn worsted weight - 220yds/100g 220 yds/100g phinizy swamp green 220 yds/100g sandlapper white 65 yds/30g sacred heart red 45 yds/20g summer in july yellow 3 75mm hook tapestry needle to attach tail legs head and to weave in ends 2 safety eyes 12mm use black thread to embroider eyes if you re making this for a young child abbreviations mc - magic_ring single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet increase - increase bobble - bobble stitch *yo insert hook into stitch pull up a loop yarn over and pull through 2* repeat 4 more times you should now have 6 loops on your hook yarn over and pull through all single_crochet xst - single_crochet cross stitch in this pattern it will always be worked in the double_crochet 2 row below for this you will work a single_crochet in the double_crochet 2 row below and then you will work a single_crochet in the double_crochet 2 row below and to the right to create that cross this will create an increase stitch pattern top when finishing a color slip_stitch to close the round when joining a new color start wherever your heart tells you too green mc - 12 double_crochet *increase* - 24 *double_crochet increase increase* repeat until the end - 40 red in the 3rd loop single_crochet around - 40 *double_crochet in the next 3 sts increase* repeat until the end- 50 *single_crochet in the next 4 sts increase* repeat until the end- 60 top continued yellow *single_crochet in the next 5 sts single_crochet xst in the double_crochet 2 row below * repeat until the end - 70 half_double_crochet around - 70 green in the 3rd loop single_crochet around - 70 *double_crochet in the next 6 sts increase* repeat until the end - 80 white *single_crochet in the next 8 sts increase single_crochet in the next 7 sts bobble in the double_crochet 2 row below* repeat until the end- 90 double_crochet around - 90 red *double_crochet in the next 8 sts increase* - 100 single_crochet around - 100 yellow *single_crochet in the next 9 sts single_crochet xst in the double_crochet 2 row below * repeat until the end - 110 *half_double_crochet in the next 10 sts increase* repeat until the end - 120 green in the 3rd loop double_crochet around - 120 *single_crochet in the next 2 sts increase* - 160 white *double_crochet in the next 12 sts
